    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Slyce getInstance(android.content.Context context)
        Get and create a new instance of Slyce SDK if one does not exist
        Parameters:
        context - The application context
        Returns:
        an instance of Slyce SDK

        The best practice is to call getInstance, and use the returned Slyce, object from a single thread

      • open

        public void open(java.lang.String clientID,
                 OnSlyceOpenListener listener)
        Initializes a new Slyce object using valid ClientID. Successfully opening the Slyce object is mandatory before you start performing any tasks in the SDK!
        Parameters:
        clientID - Your client id
        listener - notify when the Slyce object opened.

      • open

        public void open(java.lang.String appKey,
                 java.lang.String appSecret,
                 OnSlyceOpenListener listener)
        Initializes a new Slyce object using valid App Key and App Secret credentials. Use this method to open the SDK for 'Public' recognition functionality. Successfully opening the Slyce object is mandatory before you start performing any tasks in the SDK!
        Parameters:
        appKey - Use the App Key you were provided when registering in the developer portal
        appSecret - Use the App Secret you were provided when registering in the developer portal
